page.title: 19Gt.Bromley:Work Survey
page.content: As part of our survey,we asked the families of the children at the junior school where they went to work. The{2 main places}of work are{Great} {Bromley}itself and nearby{Colchester} A few people work in the city of {London}.Others work in surrounding places like: Ardleigh;Harwich;Clacton;Tendring Manningtree;Brentwood;Wivenhoe;Frating Alresford;Elmstead Market & Wix. Of 31 family survey returns,8 people are involved in{farming}work in Great Bromley:- 4 are farm workers; 1 is a vinyard worker; 1 works on a chicken farm; 1 works on a fruit farm; & 1 is a seasonal farm worker. All in all there are 42 people working in this part of Essex near their own homes & close to their children.
